name: CreateSchedulingLink
description: Creates a single-use scheduling link for appointments.

parameters.name: maximum_event_count
parameters.description: The maximum number of events that can be scheduled using this link. Currently, only '1' is supported.

value_schema.description: The max number of events that can be scheduled using this scheduling link.

parameters.name: resource_owner_link
parameters.description: A link to the resource owning this scheduling link, typically an Event Type URL.

value_schema.description: A link to the resource that owns this Scheduling Link (currently, this is always an Event Type)

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: Resource type for the scheduling link. This is always 'EventType'.

value_schema.description: Resource type (currently, this is always EventType)

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: max_event_count
parameters.description: The max number of events that can be scheduled using this scheduling link.

value_schema.description: The max number of events that can be scheduled using this scheduling link.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: A link to the resource that owns this Scheduling Link (currently, this is always an Event Type)

value_schema.description: A link to the resource that owns this Scheduling Link (currently, this is always an Event Type)

parameters.name: owner_type
parameters.description: Resource type (currently, this is always EventType)

value_schema.description: Resource type (currently, this is always EventType)

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
